column3: This pull request adds a missing feature to the Mercurial plugin : Manage branches. It simply allows to create branches on multilple repositories in the same time and allows to close the current branch.
I did not really respect the plugin architecture since it seems to be limited to one repository by command. I may have not did it right but I'm sure many developers needs these features.

Have you signed a contributor agreement? If not, could you please do so?
http://www.jetbrains.org/display/IJOS/Contributor+Agreement
Maxime did this work while it was at Systar, so it's covered by the CLA signed by Systar. If you need a confirmation of Maxime, I let him to write a comment here.
My work is basicaly under the DWTFYWT licence :) I therefore give Systar and Xavier Fournet (@xfournet)  every rights on it.
This commit adds the support of branches creation to the Mercurial pl¡­
This commit adds the possibility to close the current branch.
